attributes.action: Give the whole GB Women's Hockey team  honours and make Maddie Hinch a dame.
attributes.background: I think that the GB Women's hockey team have played out of their socks and have represented their country amazingly. They have inspired many people especially girls and women to get involved in sport.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
